page.title: 16SAINT MARYS CHURCH
page.content: St. Marys Church is a quiet place with its big east window and the tall bell tower. The brass lectern is a perfect stand for the bible or other books. The church also has a beautiful carved wooden litany desk which sits next to the pews.The enormous electric organ has toe pistons, a pedal board, stops a key board, a swell pedal, and of course lots of big pipes nearly reaching the ceiling. The hatchment at the back of the church is also very big and looks like a picture turned sideways. It has a big shield on it. The altar underneath the east window is a wooden table with a lovely patterned sheet over it. The font at the back of the pews has a lovely carved lid with flowers carved out of it. The front of it is carved too, but it is not as nice. The pulpit carved out of stone, is also carved very
